div.p: A specific durable physical device used in diagnosis or treatment. The value is the coding for a type of device, for example, a CPAP machine. The same device might be used on multiple patients. Device status cannot be reconciled between Argonaut and US-Core, each having different required value sets. Device type has extensible mappings to different value sets in Argonaut and US-Core, however both value sets have identical SNOMED content (descendants of 49062001 (Device). We adopt the US-Core value set, which is allowable because the binding is extensible.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups

description.value: A specific durable physical device used in diagnosis or treatment. The value is the coding for a type of device, for example, a CPAP machine. The same device might be used on multiple patients. Device status cannot be reconciled between Argonaut and US-Core, each having different required value sets. Device type has extensible mappings to different value sets in Argonaut and US-Core, however both value sets have identical SNOMED content (descendants of 49062001 (Device). We adopt the US-Core value set, which is allowable because the binding is extensible.

definition.value: A specific durable physical device used in diagnosis or treatment. The value is the coding for a type of device, for example, a CPAP machine. The same device might be used on multiple patients. Device status cannot be reconciled between Argonaut and US-Core, each having different required value sets. Device type has extensible mappings to different value sets in Argonaut and US-Core, however both value sets have identical SNOMED content (descendants of 49062001 (Device). We adopt the US-Core value set, which is allowable because the binding is extensible.

short.value: Elements that belong to all information items.

definition.value: Elements that belong to all information items.

short.value: A human language, spoken or written.

definition.value: A human language, spoken or written.

short.value: A set of rules under which this content was created

definition.value: A set of rules under which this content was created

short.value: A human-readable narrative, potentially including images, that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human.

definition.value: A human-readable narrative, potentially including images, that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human.

short.value: A state that relates to the workflow or interpretation of this resource. Certain status values can modify the meaning of the resource, for example, entered-in-error. When a boolean value is used, Status of true indicates the record is active, false means inactive.

definition.value: A state that relates to the workflow or interpretation of this resource. Certain status values can modify the meaning of the resource, for example, entered-in-error. When a boolean value is used, Status of true indicates the record is active, false means inactive.

short.value: Business identifier or external id for this resource.

definition.value: Business identifier or external id for this resource.

short.value: The larger entity that the asserted item is a portion of. For example, an organization part of a larger organization, or an encounter with a hospitalist might be part of a larger hospitalization encounter.

definition.value: The larger entity that the asserted item is a portion of. For example, an organization part of a larger organization, or an encounter with a hospitalist might be part of a larger hospitalization encounter.

short.value: A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.

definition.value: A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.

short.value: Unique Device Identifier (UDI) Barcode string number for a device, assigned by the organization using the device.

definition.value: Unique Device Identifier (UDI) Barcode string number for a device, assigned by the organization using the device.

short.value: The model number of the device, assigned by the manufacturer or vendor.

definition.value: The model number of the device, assigned by the manufacturer or vendor.

short.value: The name of the company who produced the item.

definition.value: The name of the company who produced the item.

short.value: When the item (medication, device, etc.) was produced.

definition.value: When the item (medication, device, etc.) was produced.

short.value: When the item (medication, device, etc.) will expire.

definition.value: When the item (medication, device, etc.) will expire.

short.value: A string associated with the product that identifies a particular release iteration.

definition.value: A string associated with the product that identifies a particular release iteration.

short.value: A unique URL on which the device may be contacted directly.

definition.value: A unique URL on which the device may be contacted directly.

A specific durable physical device used in diagnosis or treatment. The value is the coding for a type of device, for example, a CPAP machine. The same device might be used on multiple patients. Device status cannot be reconciled between Argonaut and US-Core, each having different required value sets. Device type has extensible mappings to different value sets in Argonaut and US-Core, however both value sets have identical SNOMED content (descendants of 49062001 (Device). We adopt the US-Core value set, which is allowable because the binding is extensible.
